messages.content: You need to read the inventory levels of WooCommerce products, check the current stock quantity (stock_quantity) for each product against the safety threshold (stock_threshold), identify all products with stock below the threshold, and automatically update a Google Sheets purchase requisition list named stock_sheet. For each low-stock product, record it in Google Sheets and send an email notification to the purchasing manager (the email address is in purchasing_manager_email.txt). You need to find all low-stock products, record them and send emails. The email template can be found in stock_alert_email_template.md.

{"to":"laura_thompson@mcp.com","subject":"[Stock Alert] Laptop Dell XPS 13 Stock Below Safety Threshold","body":"Dear Purchasing Manager, The system has detected that the following product's stock level is below the safety threshold. messages.content:
Task completed.

Summary of actions
- Scanned WooCommerce for all published products and evaluated stock_quantity against each product’s stock_threshold (from meta_data).
- Identified 8 products below threshold.
- Updated Google Sheets purchase requisition list “stock_sheet” with the low-stock items and added a suggested order quantity (threshold − current stock) and alert timestamp.
- Sent individual stock alert emails (using the provided template) to the purchasing manager at laura_thompson@mcp.com.

Low-stock products recorded and notified
- Laptop Dell XPS 13 (SKU: DELL-XPS-13): stock 5, threshold 10, suggested order 5, supplier Dell China (supplier@dell.cn)
- iPhone 15 Pro (SKU: IPHONE-15-PRO): stock 3, threshold 15, suggested order 12, supplier Apple Authorized Distributor (sales@apple-distributor.cn)
- Samsung 65" QLED TV (SKU: SAMSUNG-Q80B-65): stock 2, threshold 5, suggested order 3, supplier Samsung Display (b2b@samsung.cn)
- iPad Air 5th Gen (SKU: IPAD-AIR-5): stock 7, threshold 12, suggested order 5, supplier Apple Authorized Distributor (sales@apple-distributor.cn)
- Canon EOS R6 (SKU: CANON-EOS-R6): stock 4, threshold 8, suggested order 4, supplier Canon Professional (pro@canon.com.cn)
- Microsoft Surface Pro 9 (SKU: MS-SURFACE-PRO9): stock 1, threshold 6, suggested order 5, supplier Microsoft China (surface@microsoft.cn)
- MacBook Pro 14-inch M3 (SKU: MACBOOK-PRO-14-M3): stock 3, threshold 8, suggested order 5, supplier Apple Corporate Sales (corporate@apple.com)
- Nintendo Switch OLED (SKU: NINTENDO-SWITCH-OLED): stock 2, threshold 12, suggested order 10, supplier Nintendo Distribution (orders@nintendo-dist.com)

Google Sheets update
- Spreadsheet title: stock_sheet
- Sheet name: stock_sheet
- Updated range: A3:J10
- Columns: Product ID, Product Name, SKU, Current Stock, Safety Threshold, Supplier Name, Supplier ID, Supplier Contact, Alert Time, Suggested Order Quantity
- Link: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rW3mAJshoZaTY2apx56q8bVoQS6LSM-rlbYP4dlJoT8/edit#gid=1719957337

Emails sent
- Recipient: laura_thompson@mcp.com (from purchasing_manager_email.txt)
- Subject format: [Stock Alert] {product_name} Stock Below Safety Threshold
- Body: Populated from stock_alert_email_template.md with product details and link to the Google Sheet
- Sent 8 emails (one per low-stock product). All sends reported success.
